long_desc: The PlayChoice 10 was an arcade unit which played exact copies of NES games in an arcade cabinet. The machines had a choice of 10 games to choose from and ran for about 3 minutes on 25 cents.
The Versus system ran on similar hard-ware to the PC10 machines, but simply allowed you to play against each other.
Hacked to run on mapper xx
Runs with an Aladdin cartridge that locks out 10NES lockout chip
